lead_paragraph: CAHILL--Catherine Grace. May 26, 1939 - May 31, 2016. Died at home in New York City of cancer. Attended The Brearley School, Chatham Hall and Vassar College. Survived by her beloved husband, William L. Bernhard and many wonderful and loyal friends. The funeral service will take place at The Church of the Heavenly Rest, Fifth Avenue at 90th Street, on Monday, June 6 at 11:00am. Catherine was a great lover of animals. If you would like to remember her, these are some of her favorite organizations: Amaryllis Farm Equine Rescue, 44 Little Fresh Pond Road, Southampton, NY 11968. Greyhound Friends, 167 Saddle Hill Road, Hopkinton, MA 01748. Save The Chimps, Box 12220, Fort Pierce, FL 34979. Wild Bird Fund, 565 Columbus Avenue, New York, NY 10024. Wildlife Rescue Center of the Hamptons, Inc., 228 West Montauk Highway, Hampton Bays, NY 11946. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CAHILL, CATHERINE GRACE
